SessionStart.command: git config core.hooksPath .hooks && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] Git hooks configured"
command -v ots >/dev/null 2>&1 || pip3 install -q opentimestamps-client && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] opentimestamps ready"
command -v docformatter >/dev/null 2>&1 || pip3 install -q docformatter && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] docformatter ready"
command -v pyupgrade >/dev/null 2>&1 || pip3 install -q pyupgrade && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] pyupgrade ready"
[ -d node_modules ] || pnpm install && echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] node_modules ready"
